SELECT count(nick_name) from member where nick_name = #nick_name#
SELECT mem_pass FROM member WHERE mem_id = #mem_id#
SELECT mem_email FROM member WHERE mem_id = #mem_id#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE member SET state=1 WHERE mem_id=#mem_id#
UPDATE member SET nick_name=#nick_name# WHERE mem_id=#mem_id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT mem_nm, intro, category, image FROM member m, lecture l WHERE m.mem_no=l.mem_no AND l.lec_title IN ( SELECT lec_title FROM member m , myclass mc WHERE m.mem_no=mc.mem_no AND m.mem_no=#mem_no# )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE mem_no = #mem_no# AND mem_pass=#mem_pass#

SELECT * FROM member WHERE state = 4 ORDER BY mem_no
SELECT * FROM member WHERE aut = 2 ORDER BY mem_no
SELECT * FROM member WHERE aut = 1 ORDER BY mem_no
SELECT count(*) FROM myclass WHERE lec_title IN (SELECT lec_title FROM lecture WHERE mem_no=#mem_no#)
